steps.title: Start by forming the character by adding basic shapes.
steps.content: Start by forming the character by adding basic shapes.

steps.title: Draw the eyes.
steps.content: Draw the eyes.

steps.title: Draw the lines for the head.
steps.content: Draw the lines for the head.

steps.title: Draw the mouth.
steps.content: Draw the mouth.

steps.title: Add the body.
steps.content: Add the body.

steps.title: Draw the right arm.
steps.content: Draw the right arm.

steps.title: Draw the left arm.
steps.content: Draw the left arm.

steps.title: Draw the left leg.
steps.content: Draw the left leg.

steps.title: Draw the right leg.
steps.content: Draw the right leg.

steps.title: Draw the tail.
steps.content: Draw the tail.

steps.title: Add the fire on the tip of the tail.
steps.content: Add the fire on the tip of the tail.

steps.title: Add lines for detailing the character.
steps.content: Add lines for detailing the character.

steps.title: All lines are done.
steps.content: All lines are done.

steps.title: Clean up and remove the guidelines and you are done.
steps.content: Clean up and remove the guidelines and you are done. Great job!

steps.title: Draw an oval on top of a vertical line.
steps.content: Draw an oval on top of a vertical line.

steps.title: Draw a triangle around the vertical line.
steps.content: Draw a triangle around the vertical line. Add a slanted rectangle on each side.

steps.title: Draw four ovals—two at the bottom of the image and two to mark the eyes.
steps.content: Draw four ovals—two at the bottom of the image and two to mark the eyes.

steps.title: Add two rectangles at the bottom for feet.
steps.content: Add two rectangles at the bottom for feet. Also add a trapezoid and an oval (these will become the tail).

steps.title: Draw another oval on top of the tail.
steps.content: Draw another oval on top of the tail. Begin drawing an outline around the shapes.

steps.title: Finish outlining.
steps.content: Finish outlining. Add facial features and other important details.

steps.title: Erase unnecessary guidelines.
steps.content: Erase unnecessary guidelines.

steps.title: Color the drawing, using a lot of orange.
steps.content: Color the drawing, using a lot of orange.
